parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description:
The ID of the defense rule.

> You can call the [DescribeAntiBruteForceRules](~~DescribeAntiBruteForceRules~~) operation to query the IDs of defense rules.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
